caption: So  yummy!!!

I placed an order on a whim and decided to check out Ingrained for the first time and was blown away by how amazingly delectable and satisfying the bars were. I had a few questions about the bars and the owners, Syd and Andrew not only answered my questions but packed a few other samples along with my order. I highly recommend the pistachio cherry and am looking forward to future alternating flavors and creations!! I’ll be back!

This place is the best. Syd and Andrew are the friendliest and kindest people and their food is delicious. I get SO excited when I open the freezer and see the raw bars. Catch their flatbreads and all different goodies. Nutritious, delicious, gluten free, vegan, healthy, YUMMY

I usually don’t leave reviews but this place was amazing. Organic vegan gluten free desserts are hard to find but this place had so many varieties and everything was so delicious. It’s also a local shop that proudly supports diversity and inclusion. Will continue to come back.
The owners are so nice!! They went above and beyond for my friend and I. I got the cinnamon roll and it was really good 🤍

You NEED to order from this place!! Everything I’ve tried has been so delicious. Their raw bars are my favorite dessert/snack and 100% guilt free- you actually feel better after eating them! You also can’t go wrong with the cinnamon rolls. Looking at the menu and ordering from here is the highlight of my week.
My wife and I love this place. A little pricier than a regular bakery, but well worth the cost! If we could, we'd grab one of the fresh new items every day!
All the treats without all the unhealthy additives and gluten...winning!

This place is the THE BEST vegan snackery I have ever encountered. All of their items taste incredible and are so great for you. I love supporting a small business as well as their mission to make you feel your absolute greatest. They truly care about your needs & not to mention their raw bars are to die for! Could not recommend more.
Great people and really unique product - don’t usually go for vegan food but the raw bars are excellent.

The absolute BEST guilt free snacks in Chicago, hands down. The owners put so much heart into every menu item and it translates into such amazing flavours. They are always outdoing themselves - I find one favourite after the next. It’s a MUST TRY.

Ingrained has the most amazing & satisfying treats in Chicago. As someone who has a constant craving for sweets, I value Ingrained’s creative & delicious array of offerings. Cinnamon rolls to raw bars to their breads, you truly cannot go wrong. Their shop is aesthetically pleasing, and Syd and Andrew are the hardest working owners I’ve ever seen. Gluten free, vegan & so good - Ingrained is incredible.
The best vegan desserts I’ve ever had!!! So much creativity and deliciousness packed into this food.

Ive been absolutely obsessed with Ingrained and Syd ever since was selling it out of her home and now that she has moved to a store front it has only gotten better.  I could not be more impressed with the dedication and the passion she shows.  Her attention to detail and the quality of her products is unlike anything I have seem before for someone who is trying to scale her business to be able to accommodate all of her growing customer base.  Everyday she is coming up with new flavors, products and next level ideas on how to appease each one of us. I special order her grain free nola (my absolute favorite) and daily fresh baked cookies, breads, pies and cinnamon rolls are to die for.  Not only are they organic, vegan, gluten free, but knowing she has her hands in everything that comes across that counter is beyond incredible.  Could not recommend this place more!

They always have the best, most innovative flavors. Some of them are a miss for me but that's mostly personal preference. I see a couple of people saying that some of the bars have honey and hence aren't vegan but I am pretty sure that's not true. I think some of the names are creative with words like "honeycomb", "cream" and "milk" but that's just to bring back some childhood memories. I wish people would just confirm their suspicions with Syd before posting a review on google. I highly recommend the raw bars 🤤

If you're looking to cure that sweet-tooth craving, this hidden gem is the holy grail! When I tell you the best dessert like treats are sold here, I mean it! You can taste the passion and love that goes into every raw bar, protein truffle, cinnamon roll, cookie & protein buttercup. The flavors are so nostalgic that they bring back so many childhood flavor induced memories. I can't even describe to you how amazing they are. You just have to try it for yourselves & it'll describe it for itself! Need I mention their sourdoughs...? Their hot & fresh bread is a fermented sourdough which is perfect to toast or for a sandwich. Everything is made fresh daily & each item is labeled with all natural ingredients. It's all top quality & organic for all vegans & non-vegans looking for a tasty and functional treat. If I could give this review more than five stars I'd give them the Google+ Award instead!

Ingrained is the bomb.com! Amazing treats and customer service. I love supporting local businesses and this ones my fav! They use the best ingredients and the food actually makes you feel good. My favorite things are the pumpkin cookies, cinnamon rolls, and puppy chow!
This place is so bomb!! Everything is so delicious I wish I could eat it all everyday! 12/10 would recommend!

This is my absolute favorite place to get healthy vegan treats in Chicago! I'm not even vegan, but their raw bars may be the best thing I've ever had. You can just tell that every single product is made with such detail and love. Honestly can't rave about ingrained more!!

I'm generally not one for bread or reviews for that matter, but after my girlfriend turned me on to Ingrained, I can't get enough!  This charming little bakery is my much-needed change of pace from the chaotic city. Every time I step in, I'm greeted with a smile from the husband and wife duo that own and operate the shop.  On top of my lifted spirits, I always leave with a little piece of heaven in the form of their homemade gluten-free sourdough bread.  The Salted Truffle is my favorite. We pop one in the oven (don't have a toaster yet) and serve it hot—crispy on the outside, perfectly doughy on the inside.  Love this place!

BEST Vegan Snacks Evah! Feel good treats without the guilt afterwards. LOVE THE RAW BARS WITH ADAPTOGENICS! Staff is really friendly and efficient. I probs stop here weekly to stock-up on goodies; from gluten-free bread to Raw bars. This place has it all! Follow them on Instagram for more accurate hours and keep an eye out for Ghost Hours for special bundles and LIMITED edition items!
Ingrained is absolutely the best ever!! The staff is super sweet and friendly the place is nice,clean and very welcoming. The  treats/ deserts are fresh and good and made with love.

Delicious, healthy treats that are fun to eat and you feel good about it. The owners bring great energy and love to the bakery and you can tell they are living their dream. Parking is easy near the Chicago Avenue store which is neat to Foxtrot Market. Please shop local and support ingrained.

The treats here are incredible by taste alone, but they leave you feeling so satisfied (like you just ate a healthy protein bar instead of a dessert). Syd's creativity is so apparent in everything she makes. Definitely worth a visit if you're anywhere near Chicago. 10/10

I live in Nebraska and recently made a trip home to see my family in Michigan. I’ve been following Ingrained on Instagram for a long time and wanted to get my hands on some of their items, so I decided to make a pit stop in Chicago. I reached out to the owners before my trip to see what my order options were and they did everything possible to help me get what I wanted. Since most items are frozen, I was able to reserve items from their menu throughout the week before my arrival in Chicago. Everything I’ve had from my order has been amazing and I would recommend Ingrained to anyone looking for some flavorful treats and for a great customer experience. I will definitely be going there again anytime I’m in Chicago in the future. Thanks to Andrew and Sydney for running a terrific business!

My favorite treat/snack spot in the city! The owners, Syd and Andrew, care so much for their products and their customers - every single bar, loaf of bread, treat is made with the most particular effort to assure it is a  bang for your buck!!!! They even make custom cakes and loafs- amazing. I seriously crave ingrained- if you have not been, you are absolutely missing out!

Honestly, there is no place like Ingrained. The love and care they put into all of their products, SHOWS. They continue to innovate, while delivering healthy food that truly soothes the soul. The creativity in ingredients and different recipes is only matched by the insanely good taste. The cups are my favorite and true addiction. Grateful for this special place and for how hard Syd/Andrew work day in and day out!

Ingrained is literally a health foodie's dream. Syd is literally the most creative and compassionate creator. She cares SO much about every single ingredient going into her products because she truly just wants to nourish others. You can truly tell each item is crafted with love. Not only that, but they're literally the BEST SNACKS ever. I am constantly craving Ingrained and when I eat it, I feel so satisfied without any guilt. Thank you guys!!!!
Best staff and best treats Chicago has to offer!
OMG. Not vegan.  I thought their products were vegan and consumed several under that impression. I found out today that this place is not actually vegan!!!!
Not a vegan bakery. While they label their products vegan, they are not. If you voice your opinion to them directly they will block you on social media.  Do not support this place.

NOT VEGAN.  Ingrained claims to be a vegan bakery, but uses real honey in their products. After reaching out to them about false labeling I was blocked. Incredibly immature and terrible customer service.  Writing “vegan” on desserts that contain honey is deceiving.

This company marks their products as vegan but they use honey in their products. When you try to contact them they claim that honey is healthy and “most vegans consider it vegan”. Then they will block you for contacting them. Veganism isn’t about health, it’s about ethics. They should not be marking foods as vegan when they contain honey.
I just discovered this gem of a bakery and I am never looking back! The ultimate splurge snacks, without any added sugars or bad stuff.

Best, Healthy, Fresh & UNIQUE bars and bread. Syd, Andrew and Erica are simply the best. Well deserved success and recognition they are getting. They are the hardest working and innovative people we know. This place is one of our favorites and people should stop by and try it. Simply amazing!

The love affair and addiction I have with Ingrained is unmatched to any relationship with human or food I have ever had. Every bread, bar, truffle, protein cup, etc. is an absolute explosion of flavor and packed with adaptogens and nutrient overload. It almost feels too good to be true that it tastes THAT good and has endless health benefits. Added bonus, everything is legit gorgeous. The adorable husband and wife owners have such a genuine passion for what they do, and that love is contagious every time you walk into the store. Syd is an absolute mastermind. Every time I think I’ve seen/tried it all and found my favorite, she surprises me with something even better. The creativity is beyond measurable and you can literally taste the love in every bite. Syd has created something really special - A way to treat yourself in not only a guilt free way, but a way that makes you feel proud, satiated, and nourished. It’s a whole new level of self love. My fridge is stacked and I hide them in the back behind other food items  when friends come over so I don’t have to share (not sorry). Run, don’t walk to ingrained.

There are so many elements that make this place and every treat that comes out of it so special. The owners passion for her product is so inspiring to watch. Sydney puts every bit of effort, knowledge, creativity and energy she has into absolutely everything she makes- and it shows. Every product is made with such attention to detail, the flavor and presentation as a whole make the experience so special. I spent so many years beating myself up over my "terrible sweet tooth" and single handedly ingrained has turned this thought process into excitement and confidence about what I'm putting in my body. The chocolate cups are to die for. The raw bars are incredibly intricate and uniquely delicious. The breads are comforting and fulfilling. I feel so safe putting anything I buy there in my body because I know the ingredients are carefully picked and considered. Every allergy is addressed and made into a non-issue as you'd never know these treats were missing the "bad stuff." Not to mention the staff is incredibly friendly, passionate and knowledgable. If you're looking for an experience in deliciousness and ease, this is where you go.

I heard about the brand on Instagram and stopped by to try a few things. I spent over $30 and have never tasted worse vegan treats. The chocolate chip cookies and babka were so dry they were barely edible. The birthday cake raw bar was the only thing remotely edible, but after sampling the first two I was just over it. On top of that I learned that one of my friends, who had a severe nut allergy, stopped in and after being assured that what she purchased was nut-free had an allergic reaction and had to spend the night in the hospital. I hate to leave a bad review of a new, small business, but I’ve never regretted a food purchase more.
Delicious and unique. Would definitely return.

I came to ingrained for the first time a few weeks ago and have been multiple times since! EVERYTHING I've tried from ingrained has been amazing. The owner is extremely creative; every time I've been, the raw bar menu's evolved into something even more exciting and beautiful. The raw bars are a must, but the bread is also amazing, particularly the cinnamon roll and the focaccia types (though I'm sure as I'm writing this, ingrained is crafting up something even more amazing). The staff is always so wonderful and helpful - keep up the great work! Can't wait to go back many more times!

I’ve been here a couple times now, because I wanted to get a feel for it before I wrote up a review. Honestly, I don’t know what I like more, the service or the food.  The staff is super helpful and always offers opinions when asked about products. I’ve run into Syd a couple times who I find to be so nice and again very helpful. Last time she was cooking up something new and even offered me a sample, it was amazing.  Let’s get to the goods. This place makes delicious, healthy desserts a reality. You can knock that concept but it’s true and it’s amazing! Everything is limited ingredients and I know what all of them are, nothing unpronounceable or artificial. The raw bars, the truffles, the breads, the peanut butter cups it all looks amazing because it is amazing.  Bottom line: Syd is innovative and creative. The food is delicious and will line up with almost any diet. This place is the future, Syd just thought of it first. Get there, get obsessed!  P.s. yes it’s pricey, it’s healthy dessert that doesn’t suck, of course it’s pricey. You’re fine, it’s worth it.
Unbelievable products and amazing service.
The most amazing treats I've ever had. The ingredients are fantastic. You can eat anything from ingrained without feeling weighed down after. Thanks, Syd!! You're doing amazing things.

Ingrained is one of the most creative, healthy formations of enjoyable treats and food I have ever come across. This place is unique, and one of a kind. It is safe to say that if you haven't been here, you are missing out.  The owner also has an inspiring story behind why the company started; I highly recommend Ingrained to all my clients and friends. The bars are to die for, and the tonics are AMAZING. This isn't hype, its truth.
Fantastic experience!

These bars are absolutely amazing! Organic ✔️ Vegan ✔️ Gluten Free ✔️ Delicious ✔️  They use the best ingredients and are exactly what our bodies are craving. Love seeing independently owned conscious cafe's open up in Chicago. The owners are so nice. They might even have yummy samples for you to experience 😉
